name: 李正明
objective:
包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課，課程討主要內容介紹機電科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，側重在機電科技與創新設計相關之專業知識。
Week 1-9: Toward Intelligence: An Overview of RFID, Internet of Things, and Cloud Computing
schedule:
WK1： RFID technology overview
WK2： RFID technology overview
WK3： RFID vs Bar Code
WK4： Standards and Regulations
WK5：Internet of Things architecture
WK6：IoT Core Technologies
WK7：Cloud Computing Architecture
WK8：Cloud Applications
WK9：Project Presentations
materials: Lecture notes to be provided by the lecturers
